website_summaries.verdict: While it won't rock the house, the JBL Go 2 is an appealing little Bluetooth speaker.
pros: The JBL Go 2 is a very small wireless speaker that fits in a pocket and sounds decent enough for its tiny size
Its design and sound have improved from the original and it's now fully waterproof
cons: It doesn't have all that much bass and its battery life isn't great at 5 hours

customer_reviews.title: Sorry but not for me
customer_reviews.text: As usual, I relied on people reviews and... big mistake! Some people compared it to Bose mini - OMG, this is like blasphemy! Good bass sound? It has NO bass whatsoever, I played this and Bose mini side by side and come on, there is no comparison. Ok, Bose costs 5 times more, is bigger and heavier, but the sound quality is a million times better! I’ll give this to my friend’s child and get another Bose.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kireeva

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: For £30 you cant beat it for value, sounds crisp and punchy super good for music or movies and battery lasts ages. JBL is always good for value so i knew this would work for me anyway... super happy. Plenty of bass for a tiny device for all you bassheads out there ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware..!!! Do not buy. !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit only a week ago because of its amazon reviews. I really wish I had not done so. Extremely low volume. If you like music, heed my warning, do not buy. I fully charged the unit, played mp3 files and only got 90 minutes of continuous play. The reviews I read do not reflect the poor sound and life of this item. Unfortunately I do not have the original packaging otherwise it would have been returned immediately. I'm disgusted and will never trust amazon reviews ever again.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! My dad recommended it to me after he purchased one. I've been using it all the time and found that the battery really lasts and the sound quality is awesome
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: JBL do not disappoint, I have had a few days to play about with it and I love it, Excellent Sound quality, good battery life and pretty much any colour to suit your needs, Can’t beat it for the price, perfect for those card games with your mates
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Get it, use it, Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made looks/feels very nice. The sound for such a small speaker is Fantastic. I previously had a B**e speaker the was 5 times the price and sounded no better than this little delight. Don’t be put off by the size or small price, makes you wander why similar size speakers are £100???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth  Speaker fraction of price of big brands with high quality sound, an essential travel item
customer_reviews.text: Just a wonderful little device with such high quality sound that I have kept my portable Bose Speaker in the closet, which is ten times its price. We just love it and when we have a party, it plays unintrusive music in the background yet when loud music is played, the quality of sound holds well. I carry it in my handbag everywhere I travel. My Father, 94 years old bless him suffering from dementia loves hearing music pointing to my handbag to play it. The blue tooth connects instantly to your mobile device.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for 7 months and now won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is really good but today it has stopped working properly. I tried to connect it to my phone but it failed to connect. Now suddenly it will turn on and then immediately turn back off again but without making the turning off noise. So it turns on and then just dies out and I can't connect it to anything. If this is how long it lasts before crashing then it is a terrible speaker. Not sure that I can get a refund but it if it doesn't work anytime soon then what a waste of 30 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Where Size (Lack Of) Is Important
customer_reviews.text: With Bluetooth speakers you generally get what you pay for. This speaker is cheap, but the sound is better than you might expect. Obviously, no real bass, but it's perfect for packing in a suitcase for travel, where a larger speaker might take up more space than you'd like. Only downsides are... You might not like the JBL logo in your face, and there is no means of attaching a hanging loop or carabiner. The former doesn't bother me, the latter I can live with.
customer_reviews.author: K. F. Moore

customer_reviews.title: JBL go
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product. I like to make music from my iPad and need to do it from bed. I use a combination of small speakers to help me mix. I use one stereo speaker by Ks and another for very deep bass. I use JBL go to measure for the mid bass and kick together. The general sound of the unit is very good and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keep it simple

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my bathroom - colour coordinates perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that it is waterproof, colour coordinates with my bathroom with light warm woods and cream tiles. The sound quality is fantastic (not tinny) and it’s super easy to charge up! Great purchase thus far. UPDATE: I cannot believe the poor reviews people are giving this little speaker! The sound quality is great and the battery life lasts AGES! I am SO happy with my portable speaker which belts out all my fave tunes from my iphone and that of my teenager and his rap music. We’ve used it for hours since we bought it and it has NEVER disappointed. Thinking of buying one for each bathroom and my kitchen too!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great light little unit - just not Bose sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps unfair to compare to my Bose mini soundlink and if you do the depth and richness is not there - but, I didn’t buy the Go for that... I wanted a waterproof and lighter alternative to throw in a weekend bag that would be something in between my phone speaker and the Bose. Here the Go definitely delivers. It’s a great looking unit, robust and well made, great user interface and battery life - colour is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: Blue72

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the sound quality of this small speaker. Bought this for use with my paddle board. Not dropped it in the water yet but has been splashed and still works fine. So easy to connect to iPhone. Literally connects within 10 secs of turning it on.
customer_reviews.author: Mr CD Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, battery life and durability at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife so she can carry it around the house and garden whilst she's doing jobs around the place. It's great for this purpose. Sound quality is excellent. More than Lound enough and doesnt seem to distort even at high volumes. It's also very durable. It's been dropped on hard floors on a few occasions in the last few months and just powers on. Battery life is very good. We've had 4 or 5 hours on a charge. For the price we'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart F

customer_reviews.title: I just love this little Bluetooth speaker, and it’s JBL.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and compactness, great to take around like working outside on your car or the garden and then take in bathroom when you go to shower for nonstop audio entertainment, you do not have to worry about it getting wet, just love it. Good sound, do not expect too much low end from it because of the dimensions of this speaker it is virtually impossible especially at this price point, if you are looking for this you have to go up in size and three times the price price and get the Bose or Bang &Olufsen.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of kit! JBL have done it again!
customer_reviews.text: My son had the previous model which has been brilliant over a number of years now and still going strong. I bought this because of how good the first model was and I'm not disappointed. Build is excellent, battery larger capacity, water proof a real bonus because it is destined for very dusty conditions. The most important point...as would be expected from JBL great quality sound from such a small speaker, have even used these while watching a movie on projector and could completely forget that this tiny box produces such a full and big sound. Excellent value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Nepali

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is actually really good! Crisp, loud sound technology and awesome bass that really packs a punch! There isn't anything bad about it, but I just wish it was a bit bigger. Other that that, it's a 3 🌟 but I'm disappointed about the waterproof on the speaker, I tested the speaker under a tap of water and the water got stuck in the speaker and made it sound awful. That's why it's only 3 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver owen-jones

customer_reviews.title: It's small but packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit surprised when I saw the size of the speaker, (I hadn't checked the dimensions in the product description). I wasn't over confident of the output or quality from such a small speaker, but I was wrong. The max volume and the sound quality is excellent, even compared to larges premium bluetooth speakers. The battery life isn;t a good as a larger form factor speaker, but it is very good for the size of the device. It is well worth a purchase for a desk speaker or a small party. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: I was truly amazed..
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have some other Harmon Kardon speakers, and thought this little JBL being from the same stock should be great little travel companion. For such a small speaker, it really does pack a full sound. For its size it has a bass richness you would think was from a much bigger unit. Yes it’s not woofer deep, but you can tell it’s there. The mid range and top end are there too, the sound is free from distortion and carries a good volume. Certainly filled my office with music.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. High quality sound considering the price. Good all round speaker that is small and waterproof, can go to reasonable volume without distortion. It's not high fidelity but then costs just over £20, if you want high quality sound get a proper hifi, and don't use bluetooth and a compressed format as I'm sure many people will do with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Loud notification sound! In overall good little speaker, with shorter battery life then JBL GO 1
customer_reviews.text: If to compare with JBL Go (1) , then JBL first version was so much better then JBL Go2. Updated version has shorter battery life, and sound on/off is annoying, especially if you using it for a movie before falling asleep, "switch off" sound is super loud and waking me up all the time! Therefore it doesn't have an option to reduce or turn off loudness of notification sound, and it's also not nice. Apart of that good little speaker, with smooth design
customer_reviews.author: Anila

customer_reviews.title: Sound is top-notch
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say. These little speakers almost every teenager runs around with these days reached their peak in 2018 and this JBl product provides top-notch sound and an overall great feel/quality. Connection with the smartphone works fast & easy. Looking forward to experience the livespan of this thing. Hopefully many years.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel S.

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little Bluetooth speaker for my 16yr old days daughter and she just loves it. When placed near a wall the sound quality beggars belief. Great top end with an unexpected warmth they continue to surprise. Obviously, due to its dimensions, you aren’t going to get deep bass but it’s still there and really can be heard. S fantastic product which shouldn’t really be a surprise made by JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: My thoughts after a few weeks using it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for it's size, perfect to carry around, fits on my pockets discreetly as I walk around. The volume is high enough to make me have to talk louder indoors to make myself heard. Has a punchy base but it's no match to bigger speakers. I was slightly disappointed with the lack of JBL connect. The battery lasts longer than I expected, but it takes a while to fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Magalhaes

customer_reviews.title: A small speaker with great sound and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second JBL Bluetooth speaker i have, my other was a gift and I have been so impressed with its portability, the time it lasts on one charge and particularly the quality of this little power pack, I have bought the latest version, so when i forget to bring it home from work it doesn't matter. This one is suitable for the bathroom too, so music when showering is now essential. My only criticism is that it hasn't improved my singing unfortunately, but obviously with more practice........... If you are reading this and thinking about the benefits of a small portable bluetooth speaker, buy this JBL wonder box, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: simon grew

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, durable and years worth of a good little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Had the older version for over two years and started to have some problems with the battery not charging, but still great value for money. I didn’t hesitate in purchasing a new JBL Bluetooth speaker. Originally thought it was a lot quieter than the old version of the speaker, but I had to turn it up to max on the actual speaker to get maximum volume.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZIN GREAT VALUE FOR MONEY 👍
customer_reviews.text: Its absolutely amazin for a little speaker like this the sound quality iz crystal clear and its got a lot of bass i ordered it on tuesday and it came today even though it said it wil arrive on friday great fast delivery it wil come handy wen im out and about and wen i go on holiday and its great value for money aswel its good for a birthday gift or a christmas gift now i wasn't expecting it to be so good this iz the first jbl product i hav bought and i might more jbl stuff from now on so thats why i give this item 5 stars and a thumbs up👍
customer_reviews.author: rakesh karavadra

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review after using it for two months now. Use it everyday. The battery life is not the best but I cant complain. Performance is really great. I can depend on this speaker with my eyes closed. I had bought another brand a few months ago thinking I would save money but it was a junk, the sound was horrible and had I bought this to start with I would have saved money and it would have been worth it. It is worth it, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sanhita Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: Good all round small device
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good, is small and neat, it fits in a pocket and can be transported easily to the garden or a shed. I use mine when I go out to my garden and to clean out my horses sheds. The sound is good. Better than I would have expected to come from such a small device. Battery life is good. Keeps its charge. I just plug it in every few days, to make sure it’s always ready to use. It comes with a nice short lead wire. I chose the blue colour so it would be easily spotted. I can definitely recommend it, and would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Maureen Glennie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little speaker , can't believe how good the sound quality is
customer_reviews.author: Wrinkly Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work after a while! Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: A fake product. Don’t buy it. It’s working only one month after you can’t connect it at all. Personally, myself I used it not more than 15 times when I tried after two weeks to reconnect isn’t recognising my phone. I tried with tablets and other devices and not even one to discover this Jbl speaker. I haven’t updated my software on my phone. Very strange. I can connect my earphones on Bluetooth ( and cost only 10£) and I can’t connect this speaker. Very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sanda Soveja

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Very portable, great to hold in hands, really good bass, sound quality and volument level is amazing for the size. The Bad: No buttons for taking calls. It has microphone function and works great for hands free calls, wish there was a call button. Verdict: Superb for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GlobalUser

customer_reviews.title: Returned for the 2nd time in less than 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience... When I got the 1st one, it suddenly stopped working. I tried to hard reset but no luck. I then sent it back to Amazon, got another new one and this time it would wheeze while turning it on and don't work anymore. Such a big disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull and clear sound
customer_reviews.text: We hired a hot tub for my partners birthday and I thought I would get a little portable speaker so we could listen to music while in the hot tub. I'm really glad I bought this product. It's nice and small but very loud and clear sound quality. Also it's water resistant so it was ok when it got splashed or when it was raining. The charge last a good 5 hours befpr needing charging. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dan broadmore

customer_reviews.title: Bizarre controls
customer_reviews.text: The controls are difficult to operate. When it works it is OK. But it keeps powering down, unbidden. I would like to plug it into the wall, and forget about it. But it requires constant attention. The dc input lead is way too short. It worked for a few days. But now it powers up, and a few seconds later, it powers down. There are instructions in many languages - but none that I can find in English (or French or German).
customer_reviews.author: Thruns Guinneabottle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I like to listen to music and when away on holiday , having a portable speaker is very nice. I purchased this on the suggestion of a friend and it is very good. Simplicity to setup and the sound quality is very good. Sure you're never going to get deep bass from a tiny box (and this IS tiny) but the sound quality is great and placed on a table in a large room can fill it with sound.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Ives

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I work in a noisy environment but can still hear the music from the speaker, I have had to use another cable, as the USB cable that comes with it is very short. Other than that, I love it, helps keep time ticking away while at work :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Beone

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality, but exceptional microphone for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: I used this only connected to my PC as a speakerphone and the sound quality is awful, never heard anything worse. It's still good enough for phone/conference calls though and the microphone is incredibly good. It captures and emphasizes your voice, making it perfectly understandable to your audience.
customer_reviews.author: Alias

customer_reviews.title: So good we now own 4 of them
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. Excellent sound quality from such a small speaker. Waterproof. Quick to connect to your phone manually (Bluetooth) the first time then it does it automatically after that. Charges via mains so no need to buy batteries. We now have 4 of these at home in different colours. 😁
customer_reviews.author: MRS C PARRIS

customer_reviews.title: good for music , not so good for Audio books
customer_reviews.text: So this is a great little speaker, hands down beats the inbuilt phone speakers on my Huawei P20.. Looks rather cool as well in black which if your as shallow as me always helps. But a touch bass heavy if your attempting to listen to an audio book and makes the voices rather "muddy". But for music its more than fine :-)
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: When playing music this speaker is absolutely rubbish very distorted at low volume.. we brought it for better sound on watch the iPad in our hot tub spoken words suit this speaker which is good for our need but when you play music through it you cringe at that quality and turn it off
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hinsley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price!! I don’t think you can really compare it to Bose as others have done. I have Bose as my main system at home but this is perfect to take on holidays, beach trips and I even used it for my c section!! Wasn’t a fan of the gold colour though so I did exchange it for the mint which is much nicer in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Willmott

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I stupidly forgot to remove my digital radio with an aux input when I trashed my old car, and there's none on my 'new' one. Without having the money to get a new radio / bluetooth player, this is a really good way of listening to my music in the car, and not having to rely on dodgy reception of dodgy radio stations.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey REPEAT

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Read a review stating poor distance on the blue tooth connection- have to disagree on this. Mine works from roughly 40ft- through double glazed patio doors and internal French doors. Sound quality is fantastic and it’s really easy to set up and use. Overall a really neat product and fanatic value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great for its size
customer_reviews.text: Love it, bought as was getting tired lugging my jbl extreme to work so this one is perfect and fits in my pocket. Sound quality is great for the size and price, was not expecting any depth or bass so was pleasantly surprised that it has a little bit. Obviously not as good as bigger more expensive speakers but is perfect for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dothraki

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly cute little ripper!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this device is amazingly cute and rips out some proper sound for such a small thing. Battery life is excellent (so far) and music sounds fantastic. Perfect in every way. Looking forward to playing my tunes on the beach. Fantastic device for such a small cost.
customer_reviews.author: Aallie

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, good sound quality although I cannot get sound both way on Skype through Windows on my laptop. I’m not really sure this is the fault of the product so I’m rating it as very good because in every other way it’s a very good speaker. Compact for travelling is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Richards

customer_reviews.title: Amazing....so much sound from such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible. Such a great sound from this speaker....you can fit it in your pocket! I listened to my album tracks that I’ve known for 40 years and it picks out the various layers of instruments (prog rock albums tend to have lots going on) however the drums do get lost a little bit. But overall this is an incredible sound.
customer_reviews.author: John Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: When I saw it I was disappointed how small it is. After I switched it on I was impressed how powerful it is! Clear sound. Good quality. I use it in a kitchen to listen to musing while cooking :) Perfect little thing!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker with good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good little speaker - the sound quality is the biggest weak point as it doesn’t have the best bass and it isn’t too loud, but for the price, size and portability it’s still very good. Great for taking down to the beach or pool but don’t expect it to provide the entertainment for a party!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: For a tiny speaker this has a good sound quality. I use it in my garden to listen to music sent via bluetooth from my phone. Lots of people I know say JBL are excellent. At this price it is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Long battery and great sound in a waterproof package.
customer_reviews.text: Small but perfectly capable, clean and natural sounding. Doesn’t sound OTT or artificial bass. Highly recommend as a Bluetooth speaker with conf calls capabilities. Light enough to take on business trips.
customer_reviews.author: Quiggers

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with JBL
customer_reviews.text: I use the speaker for listening to music while I cook, clean, get ready in the morning etc. So I don't need anything that's super loud. This is perfect if you need it for casual listening every now and then. Mostly at home or at a park with friends. I can imagine you're going to need something stronger for a house party or a bbq. Perfect for me, very worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: For a small portable Bluetooth speaker this was a very good choice. Great value for money and good sound - as long as you don’t expect a surround sound system quality from a portable speaker lol
customer_reviews.author: AnnaM

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great little speaker for the bathroom or travelling. It's sound quality is good but the bass isn't huge - overall though this is a perfect little speaker for the price and size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Aucott

customer_reviews.title: Very good speaker for its size
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very good for this kind of size. It is really small and sems waterproof (afraid to test it.. lol). The battery life could be better but is in line with what was described, 4 to 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Investor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this little speaker. Very good sound quality, easy to use, good battery life and very portable. It is also rubberised so it stays where you put it. Great range of colours too.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin!
customer_reviews.text: This device is exactly as described and reviewed. It is so portable you can literally pick it up and take it from room to room and the Bluetooth signal remains constant. Considering the price this is excellent value for money and the sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good noise from something so compact
customer_reviews.text: Can now upset my teenagers, in a role reversal of noise levels! Very pleased with the quality of sound, from this little box. Good range too. Small enough to take in your handbag... if you'd need to?!
customer_reviews.author: Munchie4Kids

customer_reviews.title: Super little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof, powerful, simple to use and cheap. Having bought both kids one which they love, I got myself one too. So inexpensive that the kids can take them out all the time without worrying about losing them (which they haven't).
customer_reviews.author: Travel bug

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little speaker with great sound quality, so lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker, it is so small and lightweight but the sound quality is great! Definitely recommend. I went for champagne which is a nice colour but all the others look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I had the bose colour sound link before and was worried this wouldn't match up to it being 1/4 of the price, however it does exactly the same and better, the battery life is amazing! Would definitely recommend for a small transportable speaker that goes loud enough when with a chill group of friends as well as just for a bedroom speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Waples

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Kindle
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this speaker. Loud and clear and can combine it with a number of gadgets via bluetooth. So far tried it with my Kindle, my Versa watch and my mobile. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my use and my young son thought it sounded great and asked me to get him one, which I did. I bought mine at duty free at the airport and his on-line for the same price. The quality of the speak is above average and I use it all over the home.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Decent little speaker for the price (having brought it on sale). For some reason it will only pair with one device (my phone) and won’t allow any other devices to connect, but In my case this wasn’t a big enough deal to complain or return. Perhaps other buyers may want to keep an eye out for this though.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah L.

customer_reviews.title: JBL quality on a small size
customer_reviews.text: already got a bigger one, so pretty much know already what to expect. Really enjoyed the portability and the sound quality of this smaller one too. Great value for money, once more
customer_reviews.author: paolo

customer_reviews.title: Briliant Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I had the JBL Go beforehand which was just as good but upgraded to this. The sound is crisper than the older model. I use this when working round the house and it still works with a clear reception in different rooms to the audio device.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and compact speaker
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound power for the size. The bluetooth connection worked smoothly with many devices, I didn't have the nuts to put it under water but I used it in the shower and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastián D'Asta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We now have two of these at our home as the first one a blue was being used by everyone in the house. Nice small compact size that gives off a good quality sound
customer_reviews.author: Gavlaaaaarrrrr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little holiday speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the sound quality of such an affordable unit. Feels like a piece of kit that would cost a lot more. Took seconds to pair to iPhone via Bluetooth and hasn’t lost connection once in 2-3 hours use. Battery life seems good! Perfect little holiday speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Russel Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but lacking bass
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little speaker. I have a bose soundlink mini 2 and this sounds almost as good in terms of quality. It is noticeably lacking in bass however, but for the size, price and the fact that it's waterproof I can very much recommend this speaker
customer_reviews.author: Thom Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker with amazing sounds for a great price. Bonus: it is waterproof with the plug cap shut. Battery could last a little longer but really a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: angelkie

customer_reviews.title: Quality JBL sound in a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: A very useful little bluetooth speaker. Small size, nice sound. With bias because I love that JBL sound. For around £20 I don't think that you can go far wrong.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Just Bloody Loud 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive for size and price , sound quality is top notch . Looks as good as it sounds. Just Bloody Loud 👍🏻 JBL..
customer_reviews.author: jonny

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for its size and price.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent for its size/price. For listening to music in the bath its fine and much better than my tablets (amazon fire 10 HD) built in speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Zyxxy

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my 12- year old brother for Christmas, he uses it all the time. Very portable and amazing product for the price, worth every penny. Such clear sound quality from such a small speaker. Tempted to get myself one 100% worth the buy couldn’t recommend enough. Battery life is also amazing use the speaker often and he has only had to charge it once since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe24

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch for a tiny speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a little portable speaker that has a quality sound but wasn't too big. Some thing to chuck in the travel bag. It packs a punch for the size. And being JBL the sound quality is as expected. I'd say its loud enough too. Does the job anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, but doesn’t work now.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the speaker as a gift for my bf in Feb this year. But my bf told me the speaker doesn’t work. He doesn’t know why. But the sound quality of speaker is very good. I’m considering if I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Xiangyi Wang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have used the JBL GO 1 and I wasn’t expecting something less than the great quality of sound that the JBL GO 2 has. 100% Perfect Product! Waterproof, loud speaker, super easy to disconnect from one device and connect to another one thankfully to the Bluetooth button that the speaker has on. I super suggest it!
customer_reviews.author: Socrates1991

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I cannot comment on the Battery life as I have only done a quick test, however the Sound Quality is very good especially for such a small speaker. Definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cymru1974

customer_reviews.title: As good as the other reviews say...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on my daughters recommendation, have Bose 20 & 30 but wanted something small & portable for the bathroom and kitchen, packs a lot of punch, fantastic sound, compact, waterproof & very portable, bluetoothed straight into my iphone to play spotify.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker, top quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to buy this inflight but was told it had to be pre ordered/bought so was glad I was able to purchase it once home. The grandson was delighted with it and for the size it gives of an amazing sound quality! Actually sounds better than his hifi system.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker with a big sound!
customer_reviews.text: The bees knees! I couldn't believe the sound quality coming from this tiny speaker - really good sound quality. Build is solid and battery lasts 5 hours. Blue tooth connectivity strong. For the price this is a steal. I purchased after checking out Richer Sounds reviews, all 5 or 4. 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I wish for the portability I could give 10/5, it honestly is incredible. Is is way smaller than I thought, but has more bass and is louder than I thought- the best of both worlds. Go for this, and I will again for sure, it's insane. Overall 8/10. Could be a little bigger and so be bassier, but it is everything I ask for so for its size tou really can't improve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy if you want a good quality, cheap speaker
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. At such a low price, the quality is excellent. You will need a longer charger though as the one it comes with is barely 6 inches. Definitely buy if you want a good cheap speaker, buy on amazon though because JBL’s customer service is shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend and I love this little speaker. Great size to pop in your bag, looks fab and the sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable value and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I bought a cheaper speaker at £12 it did the job but sound quality was rubbish I saw this for £19.99 and sent the other one back they are like night and day - this speaker is awesome especially for the money rich deep sound - am very happy
customer_reviews.author: x11raj

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is great , perfectly fine to use for background music in the house. Great quality and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Elwira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, travel with and to use for small parties! Decent, clear sound quality, great value for money, very durable and has a two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great battery sound and usage over platforms
customer_reviews.text: Great lil product Excellent sound quality Long lasting battery small and easy to use over many platforms
customer_reviews.author: ria

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker - I use if for the car and outside events
customer_reviews.text: This is a really easy to use very portable speaker that connects to our blue tooth with one press of a button - it is robust, fairly knock and spill proof, and gives off a decent sound. Real value for money at the economy end. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Lockdown

customer_reviews.title: Best small speaker I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Does exactly what I needed it for, Can play it outdoor and still enjoy a background music, when playing indoors it’s quite loud, I don’t turn it on highest volume. Great speaker :) and it’s splash-proof, my daughter enjoys it while having bath sometimes too :)
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Deakova

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, small enough to fit in your pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this speaker. It’s got a good clear sound at low and higher volume and it’s really compact.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: JBL never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: I have other JBL sound boxes, but this one is perfect. It is very portable (fits in your pocket) and very loud. Really, it is a steal for that money.
customer_reviews.author: Giovani Guizzo

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got it for our camping trip and it worked wonderfully. More than loud enough with good sound quality that doesn't sound distorted. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Pretorius

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget. Sound quality fantastic for such a small device. Small enough to live in my briefcase when I’m travelling. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Muers

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Small compact and amazing sound. Son takes it to college for his practise with performance. Really impressed
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. I bought this after seeing my friends one and it hasnt disappointed. The first one I recieved was faulty, but the company were very good and immediately sent a replacement. Have had no problems since and have used the speaker in the garden and on holiday. Would totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maija

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he totally loved it. The sound quality is top notch. In my opinion JBL is the best in this industry.
customer_reviews.author: M.X

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough,for a speaker that fits in n your pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Great product,have bought before! Very durable and loud enough considering how small it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S
